== Description ==

Get a sample permalink based off of the post name. Only available in the Admin area and Admin AJAX.

== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$id|int|object|   Post ID or post object.|required}}

{{Parameter|$title|string|(optional) Title|optional|null}}

{{Parameter|$name|string|(optional) Name|optional|null}}

== Return Values ==

{{Return||array|With two entries of type string}}

== Change Log ==

Since: [[Version 2.5|2.5]]

== Source File ==

get_sample_permalink() is located in {{Trac|wp-admin/includes/post.php}}
